mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id_, user_number_, user_nickname_, user_email_, user_phone_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id_, user_number_, user_nickname_, user_email_, user_phone_ from user_info
